hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
rm -rf /go/src/github.com/PixoPH/
export GOPATH=/go export GOROOT=/usr/local/go export PATH=$GOPATH/bin:$GOROOT/bin:$PATH
mkdir /go/src/github.com/PixoPH/ && cp -r /root/jenkins/workspace/PDAX-Backend-Staging/ /go/src/github.com/PixoPH/backend
cd /go/src/github.com/PixoPH/backend/deployment-tools
sh -x /go/src/github.com/PixoPH/backend/deployment-tools/circleci/build-backend.sh
sh -x /go/src/github.com/PixoPH/backend/deployment-tools/circleci/configure-server.sh
whoami
aws deploy push --application-name pdax-backend --s3-location s3://pdax-circleci/pdax-backend-staging-monolith.zip --ignore-hidden-files --region=ap-southeast-1 >> deploy.sh && ./circleci/make-deployment.sh
cat deploy.sh
sh -x deploy-and-monitor.sh
